participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves to express herself through singing and playing with friends.
participant_1.background: i'm in the third grade. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: practical and down-to-earth, enjoys hands-on work and has a passion for gardening.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.

content.text: Whatâ€™s up?
In what year did i i publish its grade?
Hello there. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. Do you have a garden?
Yes, i have a garden. i love to garden.
that's great! What is size of your garden?
I love to garden and i love to sing
Cool! I love to sing to. I just got a job working in a gas station where I can sing alot
How old are you?
I'm not gon na be a good cook.
Why do you thinks so? Don't you like to cook?
I love to cook. i love to sing along the pool.
i was adopted at a young age to an older couple who were a pool singers. Do you know them?
I do not. i am a senior in the 3rd grade.
Are you a scientist?
i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma which happend in 3rd grade. Do you like clowns with a baseball bat?
Do you like your personality?
What do you feel about my person?
This is a stupid question. You mean if I'm worried how other people thinks about me and I'm not. I don't really know your peson so I don't feel a bit
I am sorry to hear that. i am sorry.
my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates but i don't want to marry a blind person because I want to have a co-worker in movie studio
I am sorry to hear that. i am a senior in high school
school sucks. Why don't you leave?
